org.apache.juneau.http.header

Class BasicLongHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.http.BasicHeader
      • org.apache.juneau.http.header.BasicLongHeader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Header, NameValuePair
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContentLength

    @Header(type="integer",
        format="int64")
public class BasicLongHeader
extends BasicHeader
    Category of headers that consist of a single long value.

    Example

    Content-Length: 300

    • Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • BasicLongHeader

        public BasicLongHeader(String name,
                       Object value)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        name - The header name.
        value - The header value.
        Can be any of the following:
        • Number - Converted to a long using Number.longValue().
        • String - Parsed using Long.parseLong(String).
        • Anything else - Converted to String.
        • A Supplier of anything on this list.

    • Method Detail

      • of

        public static BasicLongHeader of(String name,
                                 Object value)
        Convenience creator.
        Parameters:
        name - The header name.
        value - The header value.
        Can be any of the following:
        • Number - Converted to a long using Number.longValue().
        • String - Parsed using Long.parseLong(String).
        • Anything else - Converted to String.
        Returns:
        A new BasicLongHeader object, or null if the name or value is null.

      • of

        public static BasicLongHeader of(String name,
                                 Supplier<?> value)
        Convenience creator using supplier.

        Header value is re-evaluated on each call to getValue().

        Parameters:
        name - The header name.
        value - The header value supplier.
        Can be any of the following:
        • Number - Converted to a long using Number.longValue().
        • String - Parsed using Long.parseLong(String).
        • Anything else - Converted to String.
        Returns:
        A new BasicLongHeader object, or null if the name or value is null.

      • getValue

        public String getValue()
        Specified by:
        getValue in interface NameValuePair
        Overrides:
        getValue in class BasicHeader

      • asLong

        public Long asLong()
        Returns the header value as a long.
        Returns:
        The header value as a long.

      • assertLong

        public FluentLongAssertion<BasicLongHeader> assertLong()
        Provides the ability to perform fluent-style assertions on this header.
        Examples:

        // Validates the response body is not too large. client .get(URL) .run() .getLongHeader("Length").assertThat().isLessThan(100000);

        Returns:
        A new fluent assertion object.
        Throws:
        AssertionError - If assertion failed.
